articles.content: A toddler may pull a face of pure disgust upon tasting spinach for the first time, but eventually, that same child can grow to tolerate the vegetable and eventually — gasp! — even like it. And even a… [+10011 chars]

articles.title: Windows 11 update: You can get the download right now, and here's how - CNET
articles.description: Are you still waiting on Microsoft's new OS to hit your computer? If so, Windows 11 Installation Assistant could be your shortcut.
articles.content:
Windows 11 is here, and it's free to download for Windows 10 users.
